{"policy_name":"Conflict of Interest Policy","version":"2024-07-01","text":"
Section 4 – Declaration Process
1. Employees must complete the Conflict of Interest Declaration Form within 5 business days of identifying a conflict.
2. Submit the form to the Legal & Compliance team via the internal portal.
3. The manager must review and approve the declaration.
4. The declaration will be recorded in the central compliance register.
"}

Here are the steps to declare a conflict of interest, taken from the Conflict of Interest Policy (effective July 1 2024):
• Complete the Conflict of Interest Declaration Form within **5 business days** of recognizing a conflict.
• Upload the form to the **Legal & Compliance** portal.
• Your **manager** reviews and approves the submission.
• The approved declaration is entered into the **central compliance register** for record‑keeping.
If you need the full policy document or the form, let me know and I can provide a link or download.
